sn11.7:4.2: “Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, sakkassa devānamindassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn11.7:4.3: ‘yopi me assa supaccatthiko tassapāhaṃ na dubbheyyan’ti.
sn11.7:4.4: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo sakkassa devānamindassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya yena sakko devānamindo tenupasaṅkami.
sn11.7:4.5: Addasā kho, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo vepacittiṃ asurindaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn11.7:5.1: ‘Yadeva te, mārisa, pubbe cittaṃ, tadeva tvaṃ mā pajahāsī’ti.
sn11.7:6.1: ‘Sapassu ca me, vepacitti, adubbhāyā’ti.
sn11.7:7.5: Tameva pāpaṃ phusatu,
